question: A nine-year-old girl from which state has become the youngest Asian girl to climb the Mount Kilimanjaro?
explanation:
Mount Kilimanjaro, located in Tanzania, is the highest peak in Africa. With height of 5,895 metres, it the highest single free-standing mountain in the world.
This large dormant strato-volcano consists of three volcanic cones â€“ Kibo, Mawenzi and Shira. A nine-year-old from Andhra Pradesh Kadapala Rithvika Sri has climbed Mount Kilimanjaro. She is also the youngest Asian girl to climb the Mountain.
